Name: Apple Crumble Cocktail #1
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Review: That's the way the apple crumbles! In this case enhancing the flavour of  Scotch whisky.
Nutrition: One serving of Apple Crumble Cocktail #1 contains 192 calories
